about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the Python bindings of the LAL C libraries
and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lal` package.

name: python-lal
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.7
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-lal
  version: 7.1.6
source:
  sha256: 72d359a654e377c0d3cd3784580e36674b3f8cf360154e273062a5463ed7cbe5
  url: https://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lal-7.1.6.tar.xz
build:
  ignore_run_exports:
    - mkl
    - python
  number: 100
  string: fftw_py310hc77b013_100
requirements:
  build:
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h0d85af4_4

    - clangxx 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - compiler-rt 11.1.0 h654b07c_0
    - compiler-rt_osx-64 11.1.0 h8c5fa43_0
    - cross-python_osx-arm64 3.10 21_cpython
    - crossenv 1.2.0 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - gettext 0.19.8.1 hd1a6beb_1008
    - ld64_osx-64 530 he8994da_21
    - ld64_osx-arm64 530 h3681fde_21
    - ldid 2.1.2 h6a69015_3
    - libblas 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas
    - libclang-cpp11.1 11.1.0 default_he082bbe_1
    - libcxx 12.0.1 habf9029_1
    - libffi 3.4.2 h0d85af4_5
    - libgfortran 5.0.0 9_3_0_h6c81a4c_23
    - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h6c81a4c_23
    - libiconv 1.16 haf1e3a3_0
    - liblapack 3.9.0 12_osx64_openblas
    - libllvm11 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - libllvm12 12.0.1 hd011deb_2
    - libopenblas 0.3.18 openmp_h3351f45_0
    - libzlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - llvm-openmp 12.0.1 hda6cdc1_1
    - llvm-tools 11.1.0 hd011deb_2
    - lz4-c 1.9.3 he49afe7_1
    - make 4.3 h22f3db7_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - numpy 1.21.5 py310ha69e199_0
    - openssl 3.0.0 h0d85af4_2
    - pcre 8.45 he49afe7_0
    - pkg-config 0.29.2 h31203cd_1008
    - popt 1.16 h7b079dc_2002
    - python 3.10.2 h38b4d05_0_cpython
    - python_abi 3.10 2_cp310
    - readline 8.1 h05e3726_0
    - rsync 3.2.3 h652f650_3
    - sed 4.7 h3efe00b_1000
    - sqlite 3.37.0 h23a322b_0
    - swig 4.0.2 hce5123c_2
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.11 h5dbffcc_1
    - tzdata 2021e he74cb21_0
    - xxhash 0.8.0 h35c211d_3
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h9173be1_1013
    - zstd 1.5.1 h582d3a0_0
  host:
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h3422bc3_4
    - ca-certificates 2021.10.8 h4653dfc_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libcxx 12.0.1 h168391b_1
    - libffi 3.4.2 h3422bc3_5
    - libgfortran 5.0.0.dev0 11_0_1_hf114ba7_23
    - libgfortran5 11.0.1.dev0 hf114ba7_23
    - liblal 7.1.6 fftw_h0bee9d2_100
    - liblapack 3.9.0 12_osxarm64_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.18 openmp_h5dd58f0_0
    - libzlib 1.2.11 hee7b306_1013
    - llvm-openmp 12.0.1 hf3c4609_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h9aa5885_4
    - numpy 1.21.5 py310h296e039_0
    - openssl 3.0.0 h3422bc3_2
    - python 3.10.2 h43b31ca_0_cpython
    - python_abi 3.10 2_cp310
    - readline 8.1 hedafd6a_0
    - sqlite 3.37.0 h72a2b83_0
    - tk 8.6.11 he1e0b03_1
    - tzdata 2021e he74cb21_0
    - xz 5.2.5 h642e427_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 hee7b306_1013
  run:
    - liblal 7.1.6 fftw_h0bee9d2_100
    - ligo-segments
    - numpy >=1.21.5,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.10,<3.11.0a0
    - python-dateutil
    - python_abi 3.10.* *_cp310
    - scipy
    - six
test:
  commands:
    - python -m pytest -ra -v test/python --ignore test/python/test_rate.py -k 'not
      lal.rate and not lal.series'
  requires:
    - freezegun
    - lscsoft-glue
    - pytest >=4.0
  source_files:
    - test/python
about:
  description: 'The LSC Algorithm Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

    This package contains the Python bindings of the LAL C libraries

    and additional Python modules.


    Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.

    All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are

    part of the `lal` package.

    '
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lal/
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm Library Python bindings
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: lal
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo

about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the Python bindings of the LAL C libraries
and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lal` package.

commands: python -m pytest -ra -v test/python --ignore test/python/test_rate.py -k 'not lal.rate and not lal.series'
